app.name: Continue
app.one_liner: Source-controlled AI checks, enforceable in CI, powered by the open-source Continue CLI.

screens.name: Agent Checks Dashboard
screens.purpose: Display results of AI agent checks on pull requests, showing pass/fail status and suggested diffs.

rust_commands.name: install_continue_cli
rust_commands.purpose: Install the Continue CLI via curl or PowerShell scripts for local or CI usage.

rust_commands.name: run_agent_check
rust_commands.purpose: Execute an AI agent check against a pull request using a specified model (e.g., Claude Opus 4.6).

rust_commands.name: validate_model_config
rust_commands.purpose: Validate API keys and headers for LLM models to prevent errors like 402/404 during agent execution.
